Title: Turkey makes offshore gas discovery in the Black Sea
Description: Turkey has made a new natural gas discovery in the Black Sea, with estimated reserves of 75 billion m3  and a value of around $30 billion.
Author: JS

Title: Energy Endurance delivers first LNG cargo to Germany’s Wilhelmshaven 2 terminal
Description: The 174,095 m3 Energy Endurance LNG tanker has delivered the first LNG cargo to Germany’s Wilhelmshaven 2 LNG terminal, marking the facility’s initial LNG receipt since the arrival of its floating storage regasification unit Excelsior on Apr. 28
Author: CK

Title: BP LNG tanker nears Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG to load third cargo
Description: The BP-controlled 173,400 m3 British Contributor LNG tanker is nearing the BP-led 2.5 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG facility offshore Mauritania and Senegal and looks set to load its third LNG export cargo.
Author: CK

Title: US Department of Energy to resume final LNG export approvals following review completion
Description: The US Department of Energy will proceed with issuing final orders on pending applications to export US LNG to countries with which the US has no free trade agreement, following the completion of its review of public comments on the 2024 LNG Export Study.
Author: CK

Title: TotalEnergies inks 20-year LNG offtake deal with Canada’s Ksi Lisims, takes 5% stake in project developer
Description: TotalEnergies has signed a 20-year agreement to purchase 2 mtpa of LNG from Canada’s 12 mtpa proposed Ksi Lisims LNG project and will acquire a 5% stake in Western LNG, the project’s developer and future operator.
Author: CK
